query: Could you assist in creating a 3-day travel plan for a duo, starting from Nashville and going to Detroit from March 15th to March 17th, 2022? Our budget is set at $2,200. We require accommodations that permit smoking and are looking for rooms that are not shared. We would prefer not to drive ourselves during this trip.
goal: Trip from Nashville to Detroit; start date: 2022-03-15; duration: 3 day(s); budget: $2200; people: 1; city count target: 1; preferences: smoking, not shared room; must cities: None; priority cities: None
